question:

B. The fisherman didn't believe what the
fish said
C. The fisherman took care of the fish
tenderly

answers.answer:

fish said

related_questions.question:
The text is for questions 20 to 21 *    a.Javanese Hawk.

b.Wonosadi Forest.

c.The writer’s cousin.

d.A hike in the forest

21.	“We sat down and relaxed under the shades of four gigantic and ancient trees.”The underlined word is closest in meaning to … . *


a.very big

b.very small

c.very old

d.very young

The text is a part of a song. Read it to answer questions 22 to 23.

I know a girl
She puts the color inside of my world
But she’s just like a maze
Where all the walls all continually change

Fathers, be good to your daughters
Daughters will love you like you do
Girls become lovers who turn into mothers
So mothers, be good to your daughters, too.

22.	What is the song about? *


a,Family.

b,Mothers.

c,Daughters

d,Fathers




​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

20. a. Javanese Hawk 21. a. Very Big 22. a. Family

Penjelasan:

Semoga TerEnt- Membantu! :D

Jawaban:

20. D. A hike in the forest

21. C. very old

22. C. daughters

Semoga terbantu✌

related_questions.question:
9. Alucard : What do you think about our new classroom?    Ruby : ......... We need to clean it.
a. I think it's too small
b. I
c. I think it's very dirty
d. I
The text below is for question number 10 - 15
M​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

C. I think it's very dirty.

Penjelasan:

Ruby menjawab.... Kita perlu membersihkannya. Maka untuk mengisi jawaban yang tepat adalah I think it's very dirty yang artinya kurasa kelasnya kotor.

Semoga membantu ^_^

related_questions.question:
Rudi is a junior high school student. He goes to SMP 13    everyday. He goes to school on foot (jalan kaki).
Rudi likes playing gootball and basket ball every week.
He never comes late to scholl. He always respects
(menghormati) and obeys (mematuhi) his parents and
teachers.
29. Who is Rudi?
a. A student
b. A teacher
c. A player
d. A football player

30. Where is he studying? 
a. SMP 12 c. SMP 14
b. SMP 13 d. A football player

31. How does he go to school?
a. By bisycle c. By bus
b. By car d. on foot 

32. Does he like basketball? 
a. Yes, he don't c. Yes, he does
b. Yes, he liket d. Yes, he did
​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

29. a. A student

30. b. SMP 3

31. d. On foot

32. c. Yes, he does

Penjelasan:

Semoga membantu..

Jawaban:

29. A. A Student

30. B. SMP 13

31. D. On Foot

32. C. Yes, He Does

Diketahui data Panjang sisi-sisi segitiga sebagai berikut :    6 cm, 8 cm, 10 cm

7 cm, 8 cm, 9 cm

9 cm, 12 cm, 15 cm

10 cm, 24 cm, 25 cm

Segitiga yang berbentuk siku-siku ditunjukkan nomor ….

A

2 dan 3

B

1 dan 3

C

1 dan 2

D

1 dan 4


​

answers.answer:
6 cm 8cm, 10 cm
Penjelasan:
Segitiga siku siku mempunyai rumus a^2 + b^2 = c^2
6 kuadrat + 8 kuadrat = 10 kuadrat
